headline: How Cantor Fitzgerald’s Rating Shift Reshapes the Airbnb (ABNB) Investment Narrative
summary: On January 8, 2026, Cantor Fitzgerald upgraded Airbnb’s rating from “Underweight” to “Neutral,” reflecting a reassessment of the company’s prospects following recent performance and market conditions. This shift in analyst stance, alongside other mixed but generally constructive views, highlights how external research opinions continue to shape sentiment around Airbnb’s evolving business model and regulatory context. We’ll now examine how this reassessment of Airbnb’s prospects,...

summary: Tapasya Fund, an investment management company, released its fourth quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. headline: The venture firm that ate Silicon Valley just raised another $15 billion
summary: In a blog post published Friday morning, Ben Horowitz writes that "as the American leader in Venture Capital, the fate of new technology in the United States rests partly on our shoulders." It's the kind of statement certain to cause agita at rival firms.

headline: Andreessen Horowitz raises $15 billion, as VC firm goes big in infrastructure, defense
summary: Ben Horowitz, the firms co-founder, said the latest fundraising is equal to 18% of all venture capital dollars allocated in the U.S. in 2025.
